mapper.select: SELECT last_read_message_no FROM chat_user WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT u.user_no, up.profile_nickname up.image_filename FROM chat_user cu JOIN user u ON cu.user_no = u.user_no JOIN chat_room cr ON cu.room_id = cr.room_id JOIN user_party_application upa ON cr.party_no = upa.party_no AND u.user_id = upa.user_id JOIN user_profile up ON upa.profile_no = up.profile_no WHERE cu.room_id = #{value} ORDER BY up.profile_nickname;
